aboutSection.answer1: GeoDrones is an application that allows you to locate and contact people who have a drone (pilots) anywhere in the world.
aboutSection.answer2: Imagine that you are traveling and you arrive at a place with an incredible landscape. You are amazed by the landscape and you wish you could have a drone to take some souvenir images but you don't have any. Well, that's what Geodrones is for.
aboutSection.answer3-1: Create a user account. If in the registration form you indicate that you have a drone you will be considered as a pilot. In this case you can search or be searched. If you don't have a drone you can only look for pilots.
aboutSection.answer3-3: Enter a town or city in the search engine
aboutSection.answer3-4: Choose the driver you want among the search results and contact by WhatsApp
aboutSection.answer3-5: You can also save your favorite pilots and check the flight conditions anywhere

hint.youtube_modal_title: Upload a video filmed with your drone.
hint.youtube_modal_exp: Show on your profile what you are capable of doing with your drone.
hint.youtube_modal_step1: You need to have your video hosted on YouTube
hint.youtube_modal_step3: Paste the ID into the form field

faqs.answer1: In principle, the application is designed for amateur pilots, since its target audience is not looking for a professional product. Seeks to be able to have some shots at an affordable price. Professional pilots use more expensive equipment that increases the costs of their services. However, they can also register in the application.
faqs.question2: How much to charge per hour?
faqs.answer2: You can charge what you deem appropriate. Look at the average prices offered by drones with a quality similar to yours and offers a similar price.
faqs.question3: My drone model is not on the list
faqs.answer3: If you have a model that is not in our database, contact us so that we can add it.

notification.external_redirection: You are going to be redirected to an external page

error.unable_delete_user: Unable to delete user. Try again later
error.enter_valid_email: Please enter a valid email address to go on with registration process

locationModal.title: You don't know your coordinates ?
locationModal.hint_1: We will figure them out. It is necessary to enable the location permissions of your browser or device
locationModal.hint_2: If this doesn't work you can use Google Maps to get your coordinates

account_create_second_text: Complete the form to create your user account

legislation_short_exp: Flying a drone must always be done in accordance with the legislation of the place where it flies. Always check the legislation before flying.
legislation_short_exp_2: Access the Global drone regulation database to consult the regulation of any country in the world.
limited_results: Limited results. To see more results it is necessary to register in the application.
logout_message: You have successfully logged out! Hope to see you soon

my_profile_tab_exp: From this tab you can check the information of your user profile. You can also edit your profile and update your information.

search_instructions: Enter a population to locate pilots.
search_tab_exp: From the search section you can find drone pilots in a certain location and contact them

weather_short_exp: Check the weather conditions before flying and do not take unnecessary risks.
